info.name: Online Wholesale API
info.description: Complete API collection for Online Wholesale Electrical Supplier Platform

request.description: Check API health status and database connection
Register a new user account (without OTP)
Request OTP for existing customer login
Request OTP for new customer registration
Verify OTP for existing customer login
Verify OTP and complete new customer registration
Login with role specification (admin or user)
Get all products with filtering and pagination
Get all addresses for authenticated user
Get promo code usage statistics (Admin only)
Get all states (optionally filtered by country)
Get all cities (optionally filtered by state)
